name: Something Strange (Karlton)
description:
Something Strange is a horror game that takes place in a single house. The story has multiple endings and a few choices that you can make to change the events of the game. Total playthrough time is around 30 minutes to an hour. I've been working on the game for a little over a year and it is currently in alpha, I will keep updating it and I will add survival mode soon.

MINIMUM RECOMMENDED REQUIREMENTS: CPU: Intel i5, Ryzen 5 or equivalent GPU: GTX 1050, RX 460 or equivalent RAM: 8GB STORAGE: 1GB OS: Windows
